local_intent: Grasp the white plate using suction: confirm visibility, ensure/compute grasp pose, approach and align, make gentle contact, pick with retries, verify grasp stability.
assumptions: Key 'grasp_white_plate' is the expected grasp pose for Pick
Suction grasp is appropriate for the flat plate
coherence_with_global: Follows global plan around Pick: DetectObject → (PoseAvailable|ComputeGraspPose) → MoveAbove → ApproachAndAlign → LowerUntilContact → Pick (1200 ms, grasp_white_plate) → IsGraspStable.
